casebody.data:
HORINE HOLDING COMPANY, a corporation, and HOEN INVESTMENT COMPANY, a corporation, v. FLORENCE BARRETT, a widow, and EVA K. BENDLE, a widow. 24 So. (2nd) 4

June Term, 1945

December 7, 1945 Division A Rehearing denied January 15, 1946 William A. Lane, for appellant. Maxwell Baxter for Florence Barrett, appellee. Robert C. Lane for Eva K. Bendle, intervenor-appellee. PER CURIAM:

We have duly considered the record and able briefs in this case and find no error in the decree, so it is affirmed'.

CHAPMAN, C. J„ TERRELL, BUFORD and ADAMS, JJ., concur.
